comment.author: 55875389@N04
comment._content: I'm curious.. where exactly did this image come from? I have a couple of ancestors by the name of Surratt who were alive at the time.. Sarah Jane Surratt (1813-1883) and Nancy Jane Surratt (1838-1878). Perhaps this photo is one of them!!!

comment.author: 36304728@N06
comment._content: the woman here is Mary Sarratt, she married a john surratt.  This woman was hanged for conspiracy in the Abraham Lincoln assassination on July , 1865
